title: List of all Android add  to project libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android add  to project libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Snacky
repoList.description: Snacky is a small library to help you adding a Snackbar to your android project.

repoList.name: android-easy-gcm
repoList.description: Use this library to add GCM to your project, only in a few minutes !

repoList.name: ListBoost
repoList.description: ListBoost is an Android library project designed to add some much needed functionality to ListView and ExpandableListView

repoList.name: MaterialMenuDrawer
repoList.description: This App Project provides some code to implement a Navigation Drawer with Androids appcompat library v21 down to API Level 7. I will add more features soon. Enjoy and feel free to improve this code!

repoList.name: TooltipProgressBar
repoList.description: Android library for adding a progress bar with tooltips in your projects

repoList.name: UberLikeNavigation-Android
repoList.description: Simple library to add Uber like navigation into an android project

repoList.name: EventsCalendar
repoList.description: Events Calendar is a user-friendly library that helps you achieve a cool Calendar UI with events mapping. You can customise every pixel of the calendar as per your wish and still achieve in implementing all the functionalities of the native android calendar in addition with adding dots to the calendar which represents the presence of an event on the respective dates. It can be done easily, you are just a few steps away from implementing your own badass looking Calendar for your very own project!

repoList.name: Android-Pay-What-You-Want
repoList.description: A library that lets you add Pay-What-You-Want donations to your project.

repoList.name: Stories_Library
repoList.description: A whatsapp/instagram inspired stories library that can be added as a dependency and added to any android project

repoList.name: AndroidJoystick
repoList.description: This library is a modified version of the JoystickView widget (and its associated classes) available from the mobile-anarchy-widgets project on Google Code (http://mobile-anarchy-widgets.googlecode.com). I've stripped the code to my needs and added some customization options that I needed for my own project.
